---
title: 'tx_search'
openapi: 'POST /json-rpc'
playground: 'interactive'
---
### Parameters

Transaction search parameters in the order: [query, prove, page, per_page, order_by, match_events]

- `params[0]` (string): A transaction query string (e.g., "tx.height=1000").
- `params[1]` (boolean): Include proofs of the transaction inclusion in the block.
- `params[2]` (integer): Page number (1-based).
- `params[3]` (integer): Number of entries per page (max: 100).
- `params[4]` (string): Order of transaction sorting ("asc" or "desc"), by height & index.
- `params[5]` (boolean): Match attributes in query within events in addition to height & txhash.

### Returns

<ResponseField body='result' type='object'>
  The transactions returned with the search queries.
</ResponseField>

<RequestExample>

```bash Curl
curl --request POST \
  --url https://api.uniblock.dev/uni/v1/json-rpc?chainId=2222 \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{
    "id": 1,
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "method": "tx_search",
    "params": [
      "tx.height=1000",
      true,
      1,
      30,
      "asc",
      true
    ]
  }'
```

```json JSON-RPC
{
  "id": 1,
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "tx_search",
  "params": [
    "tx.height=1000",
    true,
    1,
    30,
    "asc",
    true
  ]
}
```

</RequestExample>
<ResponseExample>

```json Success
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 1,
  "result": {
    "txs": [
      {
        "hash": "D70952032620CC4E2737EB8AC379806359D8E0B17B0488F627997A0B043ABDED",
        "height": "1000",
        "index": 0,
        "tx_result": {
          "log": "[{\"msg_index\":\"0\",\"success\":true,\"log\":\"\"}]",
          "gas_wanted": "200000",
          "gas_used": "28596",
          "tags": {
            "key": "YWN0aW9u",
            "value": "c2VuZA==",
            "index": false
          }
        },
        "tx": "",
        "proof": {
          "RootHash": "72FE6BF6D4109105357AECE0A82E99D0F6288854D16D8767C5E72C57F876A14D",
          "Data": "",
          "Proof": {
            "total": "2",
            "index": "0",
            "leaf_hash": "eoJxKCzF3m72Xiwb/Q43vJ37/2Sx8sfNS9JKJohlsYI=",
            "aunts": [
              "eWb+HG/eMmukrQj4vNGyFYb3nKQncAWacq4HF5eFzDY="
            ]
          }
        }
      }
    ],
    "total_count": "2"
  }
}
```

```json Error
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 1,
  "error": {
    "code": -32600,
    "message": "Invalid Request"
  }
}
```

</ResponseExample>
